Name: Awaken The Time
About the game: Awaken The Time is a third-person time-traveling adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world where the last surviving god travels across different lifetimes. It’s a unique story divided into 5 Chapters containing different time periods and gameplay styles. 3 GamePlay styles and 5 Acts: Act 1(Past) In the first act, you are a samurai that can wield multiple fighting styles: melee, archery, and magic. Act 2 You go into the garage and you’ll find a companion from the maze. And he will throw you in the future. Act 3 A survivor in a post-apocalyptic environment. Shooting through hordes of zombies and survivors. Act 4 You will find a suit that can control time and find this captive entity. Act 5 You will be betrayed by your AI and another entity that wants you trapped because he can’t kill you.
